Description: Control key binding/mapping. This key makes info boxes appear above each teammate's head (in your HUD), to inform you about their health and ammo status.

French.Translation: Maintenir pour afficher les infos des coéquipiers

Italian.Translation: Tieni premuto per mostrare info compagno di squadra

Spanish.Translation: Mantener para ver información de compañeros

Russian.Translation: Удерживать, чтобы показать сведения о напарниках

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Segurar para mostrar informações do aliado

Polish.Translation: Przytrzymaj, aby pokazać informacje o członku drużyny

Japanese.Translation: 長押しでチームメイト情報を表示

name: MainMenu.Settings.HoldToShowTeammateInfo
